name: Cat Escape! Infinity！
summary: Do you like the game of cat and mouse? Are you ready to challenge the squid game and win the final victory to survive? The most popular hide and seek endless version of the game is back again, which adds a lot of Kawaii's cat image and a lot of little girl's skin for you to choose from. look out! The furry cat has begun to look for your trace. Hide and win!
